description:
Say hello to the Alameda Pant for men. This do-it-all pant boasts all the strength and stamina fans have come to rely on in their original Stretch Zion collection, but with a more sustainable and modernized fit and feel.

Made with ReZion™, the Earth-friendly evolution of their bestselling performance fabric, you can adventure confidently knowing there are over two decades of tried and trusted durability backing you up. Speaking of backing you up, there's also plenty of storage too, as well as style to spare thanks to a straight leg fit.
name: Prana Alameda Pants, 32" Inseam - Mens
